faq.answer_1: We specialize in a wide range of development, including **web applications**, responsive websites, e-shops, mobile applications (iOS/Android), and custom software solutions. Whatever you need, we'll find an effective solution.
faq.question_2: How long does website development take?
faq.answer_2: Development time depends on the project's complexity. A simple presentation website can be completed in **2-4 weeks**, while a larger e-shop or web application can take **2-4 months** or even longer. We'll always provide you with a realistic estimate after an initial consultation.
faq.question_3: Do you also offer maintenance and support after launch?
faq.answer_3: Yes, of course! We provide **comprehensive post-sales support and maintenance**, which includes regular updates, security patches, performance monitoring, and technical support. We want your project to function smoothly long-term.
faq.question_4: How does the collaboration process work?
faq.answer_4: Our collaboration begins with an **initial consultation**, where we discuss your needs and vision. This is followed by the planning and design phase, then the development itself, testing, and finally launch. We will actively keep you informed of the progress and involve you in decision-making throughout the entire process.
faq.answer_5: We use modern and proven technologies. For the frontend, these include **Angular, React, Vue.js**, for the backend **Node.js, Python (Django/Flask)**, databases like **PostgreSQL, MongoDB**, and cloud platforms. We always choose the most suitable tools for your specific project.
faq.question_6: Can you help me with SEO optimization?
faq.answer_6: Yes, SEO optimization is an integral part of our services. Even during development, we focus on technical SEO (loading speed, mobile responsiveness, code structure), and after launch, we can also offer **content optimization and link building strategies** to help you achieve better search engine rankings.
faq.write_us_prompt: Didn't we answer everything? Write to us

project_1.name: Electronics E-shop
project_1.description: Complete development of a modern, custom e-shop with advanced features like order management, payment gateway, inventory tracking, and responsive design for mobile devices.

project_2.name: Fitness Mobile Application
project_2.description: Development of a native mobile application for iOS and Android, allowing users to track workouts, plan exercises, monitor progress, and interact with trainers. Includes integration with wearables.

project_3.name: Logistics Information System
project_3.description: Custom web-based information system for optimizing logistics processes, including shipment tracking, fleet management, route planning, and reporting. Improves efficiency and reduces costs.

project_4.name: Presentation Website for Architectural Studio
project_4.description: Creation of an elegant and visually appealing website showcasing an architectural project portfolio, with interactive galleries and contact forms.

project_5.name: Booking System for Clinic
project_5.description: A simple and intuitive online booking system for a medical clinic, allowing patients to reserve appointments, receive reminders, and manage their bookings.

project_6.name: Corporate Website Redesign
project_6.description: Complete redesign of an existing corporate website with an emphasis on modern UI/UX, mobile optimization, and SEO improvement. The goal was to increase conversions and strengthen the brand.

project_7.name: Online Course Platform
project_7.description: Development of a comprehensive educational platform with video courses, interactive exercises, user management, and an advanced system for grading and certification.

project_8.name: Custom CRM System
project_8.description: Development of a tailor-made CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system for the client's specific needs, including customer management, sales cycles, communication, and analytics.

project_9.name: Reporting Automation
project_9.description: Software for automating data collection from various sources and generating dynamic reports and dashboards. Reduces the time needed for data analysis and improves decision-making.

project_10.name: Event Management Web Application
project_10.description: Interactive web application for event organizers, enabling registration management, ticket sales, communication with attendees, and event logistics planning.

academy.intro_text: Discover our programming courses and elevate your skills to a new level.

web_development.title: Web Development - Create Interactive Websites
web_development.description: Dive into the world of web technologies and learn to create modern and responsive websites and applications.

1.title: Beginner (9-17 years)
1.content: This course is designed for children with no prior programming experience. We will learn basic concepts of logic, algorithms, and problem-solving using visual programming (e.g., Scratch) and simple text commands. Children will create their first interactive stories and games.

2.title: Advanced (11-17 years)
2.content: Building on the basics, this course deepens knowledge in a specific programming language (e.g., introduction to Python or JavaScript). We will focus on more complex data structures, functions, and the creation of more comprehensive projects, such as simple applications or advanced games. Children will learn to write code more efficiently and solve more complex problems.

theme.2: Styles and Layout in CSS (flexbox, grid)
theme.7: Projects: Interactive Form, Simple Game, Animation Ball

3.title: Expert (12-17 years)
3.content: For those who already have a solid foundation and want to become true experts. We will work on individual projects, solve real programming challenges, and learn advanced techniques. Children will refine their debugging skills, optimization, API work, and teamwork. They will be prepared to create their own innovative solutions.

desktop_development.title: Desktop Development - Create Applications for Desktop Computers
desktop_development.description: Gain skills in programming desktop applications with graphical interfaces for various operating systems.

1.title: Beginner (11-17 years)
1.content: This course is designed for children with no prior programming experience. We will learn basic concepts of logic, algorithms, and problem-solving using visual programming (e.g., Scratch) and simple text commands. Children will create their first interactive stories and games.

theme.3: Basics of data types and variables
theme.5: Mini-projects: Simple Calculator, Random Number Generator

2.title: Advanced (13-17 years)
2.content: Building on the basics, this course deepens knowledge in a specific programming language (e.g., introduction to Python with tkinter or C# with WinForms). We will focus on creating graphical user interfaces (GUIs), working with events, saving data to files, and object-oriented programming.

theme.3: Saving and loading data from files
theme.5: Mini-projects: Simple Text Editor, Drawing Program

3.title: Expert (14-17 years)
3.content: For those who already have a solid foundation and want to become true experts. We will work on complex desktop applications, address performance optimization, work with external libraries, and collaborate on larger projects. The goal is to create robust and user-friendly applications.

theme.6: Projects: Task Manager with Database, Simple 2D Game

services.service_main_text_1:
In the digital world, a strong online presence is key. We offer comprehensive web development solutions, from modern and responsive custom websites to complex and robust web applications. We specialize in using the latest technologies to ensure optimal performance, security, and an excellent user experience for every visitor.

It doesn't matter whether you need a corporate presentation, an e-shop, a portal, or a complex internal system – with us, you'll get a digital solution that grows with your business and effectively reaches your target audience. We emphasize clean code, modular architecture, and easy extensibility.
services.service_main_text_2:
We deliver powerful and reliable desktop applications designed for Windows, macOS, or Linux. Whether you need a tool for internal processes, specialized software for your niche, or a robust analytical application, we will ensure optimized performance, an intuitive user interface, and maximum security.

Our solutions are tailored to the specific needs of your business, guaranteeing increased productivity, task automation, and more efficient data management. With an emphasis on stability and easy maintenance, we create applications that are ready for the challenges of today's digital world and grow with your requirements.
services.service_main_text_3:
We live in an era of mobile devices, where direct interaction with customers and efficient management of internal processes are key. We offer complete solutions for mobile applications, whether you need native applications for iOS (iPhone, iPad) and Android, or efficient cross-platform solutions that reach a wider audience with a single codebase.

Our scope extends from commercial applications for public App Store and Google Play to specialized internal systems. We develop mobile CRM solutions, task management tools, field data collection, mobile access to enterprise systems, and much more. We focus on applications that are not only visually appealing and easy to use, but also powerful, secure, and optimized for specific mobile platforms and corporate environments. From initial UI/UX design to deployment and publication (whether in stores or internal distribution), we are your partner for digital innovation that keeps pace with the mobile world.
services.service_main_text_4:
Unleash the potential of artificial intelligence to transform your business and processes. We specialize in the integration and implementation of advanced AI services and APIs directly into your existing and new projects. We will help you effectively utilize the best of available AI technologies for automation, performance improvement, and gaining deeper data insights that will give you a competitive advantage.

We implement AI into CRM systems, automate customer support using chatbots, personalize content, perform predictive analysis, or optimize internal processes. Our AI solutions are designed to deliver concrete and measurable results, streamline your operations, and move your company forward in the digital era. We focus on practical AI utilization that brings immediate value and supports your growth.
